title: Chapter 937 - A Late Night Conversation
body:
Chapter 937 - A Late Night Conversation

Black fog hovered in the air. Blood-colored lightning interwove, and an air of destruction permeated heaven and earth.

From time to time, blood-colored lightning descended upon a graceful figure, scattering electric sparks.

However, that graceful figure didn’t care in the least.

Her gait was elegant and composed, and her beauty was unsurpassed.

It was only after she emerged from the Great Chaos Ruins that her appearance was clearly discernible.

Her flowing, long blue hair was tied up behind her head, and her unadorned, ink-black dress offset her snowy skin and bright eyes.

Her face was as pure and exquisite as a young woman’s. Her lips were as red as fire, and her eyes were bright. There was an unearthly charm about her features.

Her beauty was enough to astonish the masses, but she was cold, cruel, and indifferent as a goddess, or a sovereign gazing down upon the masses.

The Netherworld King!

The expert who’d struck terror into the hearts of the trillions of inhabitants of the Netherworld in ancient times!

The Nine Serenities Netherworld Crow’s voice shook with excitement. “Your Excellency, you really broke free!”

“No, my true body remains confined at the bottom of the Great Chaos Ruins.”...
